document_data.name: The Paws of the Cheetah
document_data.location:
[[Cloak Wood]], [[Sword Coast]]
[[Baldur's Gate]], [[Western Heartlands]]
[[Black Pits]], [[Underdark]]
[[Saradush]], [[Forest of Tethir]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Paws of the Cheetah''' were a pair of ''[[boots of speed]]'' that, slightly differently from others of their sort, doubled their wearer's speed of movement on foot at all times.
document_data.History:
They were used by a deadly [[assassin]] from the [[Sword Coast]] who chased down his prey at a speed that was faster than a running horse. While the name of this assassin was not known,

In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, the boots were in the possession of [[Drasus]], and adventurer who worked for [[Rieltar Anchev]] of the [[Iron Throne]] and was stationed at the old [[Cloak Wood mine|dwarven mine]] in the [[Cloakwood]].

By the following year, the ''Paws of the Cheetah'' came into the possession of [[Illasera|Illasera the Quick]].
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Elan Garaq]], a [[rakshasa]] trader in the [[Black Pits]].
*[[Hoach Randymonk]], a craftsman of [[Bridgefort]] ''circa'' 1368 DR who knew a secret recipe for the '''Paws'''' creation.
